metadata.title: CVE-2021-32472 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Teachers exporting a forum in CSV format could receive a CSV of forums fromall courses in some circumstances. Moodle versions 3.10 to 3.10.3, 3.9 to3.9.6 and 3.8 to 3.8.8 are affected.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
